article_title: La Voz Latina moving to new Rockford site, expanding services

article_metadata.description: ROCKFORD — Community organization La Voz Latina is moving to a larger location and planning to expand its programs.The agency recently purchased the building at 730 N. Church, which was formerly occupied by Rockford Business College. The new facility will offer more space — about 17,000 square feet — than is available at La Voz’s current offices at 412 Market St.“In addition to our regular programming, a bigger facility means that we’ll be able to
article_metadata.author: Dorothy Schneider Rockford Register Star
